1. '''Support the Generic Access Profile'''
  a. Connect a Bluetooth keyboard
  a. Confirm basic functionality

1. '''Support the Service Discovery Profile'''
  a. Connect a Bluetooth mouse.
  a. Retrieve properties of device
  a. Confirm basic functionality

1. '''Support the Hands Free Profile (HFP) Used by VIOP'''
  a. Connect a Bluetooth phone headset.
  a. Make a call

1. '''Support the Generic Object Exchange Profile (GOEP)'''
  a. Connect to Bluetooth enabled mobile phone
  a. Use as modem to connect to web

1. '''Support the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP)'''
  a. Connect to Bluetooth headphones
  a. Load audio file and confirm smooth playback

1. '''Support the Human Interface Device Profile (HID)'''
  a. Connect Bluetooth joystick
  a. Confirm basic functionality

1. '''Support the Headset Profile (HSP)'''
  a. Connect a Bluetooth phone headset.
  a. Confirm minimal controls including the ability to ring, answer a call, hang up and adjust the volume.
